chapters.title: Prologue: By Grace and Banners Fallen
chapters.info: Canler, p. 55—One of the Dedicated in the Black Tower. He grew up in Andor, and was a farmer before reporting to the Black Tower. He is sturdy, and has gray in his hair. He reported to Logain in the Black Tower. He is older than Emarin and Nalaam. His face is square and sun-wrinkled. He and Emarin are good friends, though nearly complete opposites: He is crotchety and prone to gossip, while Emarin is tall, refined, and careful. See also Emarin; Leish.
